data: The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" records that attendees introduced themselves and clarified roles.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" records that 20% of the Q1 budget was allocated to marketing efforts.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" records that 15% of the Q1 budget was allocated to research and development.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" indicates that marketing funding was approved.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" indicates that research and development allocation was decided.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" identifies an action item to finalize vendor contracts.
The note "Q1 Budget Meeting Notes" identifies an action item to schedule a follow-up meeting.
